Class View<V extends View<V,C>,C extends ViewController<V,C>>

java.lang.Object
musicApp.views.View<V,C>
Type Parameters:
V - the View class that gets extended
C - the Controller class that gets extended
Direct Known Subclasses:
MediaPlayerView, PlayerView, PlayListView, SettingsView, SongView, ToolBarView
public abstract class View<V extends View<V,C>,C extends ViewController<V,C>> extends Object
View class for the application.
